: : Kup / Rodimus Prime : :

Kup: Well we are getting a little off track...=


Rodimus Prime: Go ahead and tell her the stories Kup. Our history doesn't=
 bother me, just Galvatron.

Kup: Very well. You see Nightlight Optimus had=
 once been brought back but with little control of himself. He was a zombie=
. It was all a Quintesson trap. He was to lead us Autobots to are destructi=
on. Prime fought it though and saved us, however he was on a ship that was =
destroyed. We thought he was lost forever. About six months later we learne=
d that a Science ship from Earth had been near by. They were testing a new =
alloy, by seeing if their ship could withstand a sun going nova near by. It=
 did. They also pulled Optimus out before his ship was destroyed. They had =
also taken aboard spores from the sun. Mere contact with these spores turne=
d living things into hateful maniacs. The scientists who found the spores h=
ated Transformers so they lead us to find Optimus. Then they infected many =
Autobots. It soon spread to the Decepticons, the human race, and then into =
the universe. Rodimus was even infected. We managed to have a Quintesson re=
build Optimus once again. By coating himself in the alloy from the science =
ship he was able to take the Matrix of Leadership from Rodimus. Optimus use=
d the last power of the Matrix and destroyed the Plague with the wisdom of =
the ages. Optimus continued to lead us from then on untill the Great Wrs en=
ded. Thats when everything was scaled down and Maximals and Predacons were =
born.

OOC: The events I am talking about can be seen in the following thir=
d season episodes of "The Transformers": "Dark Awakaning," "Return of Optim=
us Prime Part. 1," and "Return of Optimus Prime Part. 2"

<DIV align=center><STRONG><FONT face=Arial size=2>: : Kup / Rodimus Prime : 
:</FONT></STRONG></DIV>
<DIV align=center><STRONG><FONT face=Arial size=2></FONT></STRONG> </DIV>
<DIV align=center><FONT face=Arial size=2><STRONG>Kup: </STRONG>Well we are 
getting a little off track...</FONT></DIV>
<DIV align=center><FONT face=Arial size=2></FONT> </DIV>
<DIV align=center><FONT face=Arial size=2><STRONG>Rodimus Prime: </STRONG>Go 
ahead and tell her the stories Kup. Our history doesn't bother me, just 
Galvatron.</FONT></DIV>
<DIV align=center><FONT face=Arial size=2></FONT> </DIV>
<DIV align=center><FONT face=Arial size=2><STRONG>Kup: </STRONG>Very well. You 
see Nightlight Optimus had once been brought back but with little control of 
himself. He was a zombie. It was all a Quintesson trap. He was to lead us 
Autobots to are destruction. Prime fought it though and saved us, however he was 
on a ship that was destroyed. We thought he was lost forever. About six months 
later we learned that a Science ship from Earth had been near by. They were 
testing a new alloy, by seeing if their ship could withstand a sun going nova 
near by. It did. They also pulled Optimus out before his ship was destroyed. 
They had also taken aboard spores from the sun. Mere contact with these spores 
turned living things into hateful maniacs. The scientists who found the spores 
hated Transformers so they lead us to find Optimus. Then they infected many 
Autobots. It soon spread to the Decepticons, the human race, and then into the 
universe. Rodimus was even infected. We managed to have a Quintesson rebuild 
Optimus once again. By coating himself in the alloy from the science ship he was 
able to take the Matrix of Leadership from Rodimus. Optimus used the last power 
of the Matrix and destroyed the Plague with the wisdom of the ages. Optimus 
continued to lead us from then on untill the Great Wrs ended. Thats when 
everything was scaled down and Maximals and Predacons were born.</FONT></DIV>
<DIV align=center><FONT face=Arial size=2></FONT> </DIV>
<DIV align=center><FONT face=Arial size=2>OOC: The events I am talking about can 
be seen in the following third season episodes of "The Transformers": "Dark 
Awakaning," "Return of Optimus Prime Part. 1," and "Return of Optimus Prime 
Part. 2"</FONT></DIV>
